caption: A melancholic Chinese post-rock instrumental with ambient textures, delayed guitars, and gradual dynamic builds. The production features ethereal soundscapes with sparse vocals appearing only in the climax.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]

[Build]

[Verse 2]
城市的尽头
有一片海
我站在那里
听风的声音

[Climax]
所有的故事
都随风而去
所有的眼泪
都化作星辰

[Verse 3]

[Outro]
再见了
我的过去
你好啊
我的未来
